name: Shabby Home Designer
description:
]CONTROLS]

Left Mouse used for placing furniture and floor/wall drawing

W + S scroll thru furniture category list on right

A + D cycles thru selected category

Arrow Keys resize room

R creates new room

C clears only furniture, leaving your carpet and wallpaper

Made over the course of a few days. Assets mostly grabbed off youtube and google image search.

Thanks to Carpet, KeroCola, and Jack Mouse for various pieces of furniture.
